shri lanka guwan hamudawa thewani sthanayata pathwiya.tharagaye (widyanukula) dakshathama kridakayata himi sar wiliyam manin abhiyoga kusalanaya guwan hamudawe em.wayi.em.dilshan ha dakshathama kridikawa lesa mas sadarn pile dabliw.shashikala sammana himikara gathha.dakshathama parajithayata himi donald munasinha abhiyoga kusalanaya yuda hamudawe ee.chandrakumara dinagath athara dakshathama parajitha kridikawa lesa polis pile shiromala wirarathna sammana dinagaththaya.wasare dakshathama boksin kridikawa sammanaya siya boksin diwiye awasan tharagawaliyata sahabhagi wu mas sadarn boksin kandayame anusha kodithuwakku wisin dina ganu labiya.madhyama palath maha amathi sarath eekanayaka, mahanuwara purapathi mahen rathwaththa saha boksin sangamaye hitapu sabhapathi dayan gomas mahathwarunge pradhanathwayen thyaga pradanothsawaya pawathwini.awasan prathipala meseya.pirimi- ki.gra. 91ta wadi - dab.sandun ( guwan hamudawa), ki.gra. 91ta adu - bi sampath (nawika hamudawa), ki.gra. 81ta adu- suranga mudannayaka( slim layin), ki.gra.75- em.diwarathna ( yuda hamudawa), ki.gra.69- pi.rajapaksha (slim layin), ki.gra.64-aar.gunathilaka (guwan hamudawa), ki.gra.60- aar.gunathilaka (slim layin), ki.gra.56 – manju wanniaarachchi (slim layin), ki.gra.52- pi.di.suresh (slim layin), ki.gra.49- em.prabhashwara (liniya)kantha - ki.gra.81ta wadi- ti.wirasinha (yuda hamudawa), ki.gra. 81- ji.silwa (guwan hamudawa), ki.gra.75ta adu - dab.shashikala (mas sadarn), ki.gra.64- je.jayasekara (mas sadarn), ki.gra. 60ta adu- el.udayangani (mas sadarn), ki.gra.57- ke.hansika ( mas sadarn), ki.gra.54- widushika prabadhi ( mas sadarn), ki.gra. 51- ke.silwa (mas sadarn), ki.gra. 48- nilmini kosala (mas sadarn).
